titles.title: To reliquidate certain entries on which excessive countervailing duties were paid, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/6/1993--Introduced. Provides, upon request filed with the appropriate customs officer, for the reliquidation (refund) of excessive countervailing duties (plus interest) that were imposed on specified entries into the United States.
